overview:
Rob Anderson has more than 13 years of experience in the telecommunications industry. As CTO, Rob leads the technological development of location hardware, software, and devices, and works with TruePosition partners and customers to develop new wireless location solutions.

Prior to joining TruePosition, Rob held systems engineering positions at Lockheed Martin and TRW (now Northrop Grumman), focusing on satellite cellular systems.

Rob Anderson graduated at the top of his class from Purdue University, where he earned both Bachelor of Science and Masters of Science Degrees in Electrical Engineering.
